Text.Page:
The argons pour out of {@Rgn:48005$$Valgurati Stronghold} to ravage our troops.

I want you to go over there. Meet with {@LinkCreature:248#3010#Orveras} and see if you can delay the argons.

It might just give us an opening to strike back.
From here we strike at these cursed argons. We also watch and learn.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What did you find?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

If you take out the {@LinkCreature:48#6#vulnaq threshers} or {@LinkCreature:48#400#zolnaj transporters}, the argons won't be able to replace their losses anytime soon.

The endless stream of killers is one of their chief advantages. Interrupting it seems like a good idea.

Hah! That feels good, like we did something that mattered!

I'll send word of your deeds to Zulfikar Fortress. Long live the Shariar!
